plot: Rubianes' widows -that is how this bunch of comic and showman Pepe Rubianes' close friends call themselves- meet to have dinner and celebrate Rubianes' life, art, and friendship. This documentary records one of those dinner parties, illustrating their stories and anecdotes about Pepe with photographs and video recordings of his life and shows.   Written by  M. Lasierra
title: Pepe & Rubianes
